law.catch_line: Governor-elect and statewide constitutional officers-elect to be informed.

text.section: The Governor-elect shall receive all budget unit requests and supporting documentation for the executive branch no later than November 10, of the year of his election. He and those persons named by him shall be entitled to participate in the budget making process for the executive branch.
Any statewide constitutional officers-elect shall, upon request, receive all budget requests and supporting documentation relating to their offices.

law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 450, sec. 6, effective July 1, 1983.
